data.message: A short time ago i had a lady named Laura Kay Timmons contact me and said I had been chosen by Mark Zuckerman CEO of Face Book to receive a large sum of money, she told me that I had to send $400 for the filing fee to receive the funds, I want to know if she is your lottery agent and if she works for Face Book usually when you have to send money to receive money it is a scam thanks please confirm this person

replies.message: Hey Eric, this sounds like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1mBmsib. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Jordan
Eric that is a classic scam.
